MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA17 postcode area of Darvel, affecting properties in Loudoun Avenue and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.55pm. Our engineers are on their way to the Priestland Villiage substation to investigate a potential blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:10PM on Wednesday 17 February 2021.
